metadata.title: As a Safety Function, Touch IP Can Detect Its Own Fault?

sections.content:
Question:
As an additional safety function, is it possible for me to configure the Touch IP to detect a Touch IP MCU malfunction?
Answer:
Renesas's capacitive touch buttons (CTSU and CTSU2) allow the self-test software to diagnose its own circuitry.
Refer to the Functional Safety Solutions for Capacitive Touch Sensors Web page for more information.
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/application/industrial/building-home-automation/functional-safety-solution-capacitive-touch-sensor
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
